text.name: Tidal Elegy
text.desc:
When attacking just a single target(in Focused Encounters, a Core and its connected Parts count as a single target), Coin Power +2 and deal +100% damage
[WhenUse] If the main target has 4+ [Sinking], Clash Power +1
[BeforeAttack] If the main target has higher than 1 Gloom Resist., deal +2% damage for every 0.1 excess Resist. (max 10%)
[BeforeAttack] At 2+ Gloom Reson., deal +5% damage for every Gloom Reson. (max 20%)
[EndSkill] If 1 or more targets are killed, deal ([Sinking] Potency on each target / 2) Gloom damage against 2 random enemies (max 15; prioritizes targeted enemies with the most [Sinking] Potency)
coinDescs: [OnSucceedAttack] If there are Staggered, Part broken, or killed units among the targets, inflict 2 [Sinking] against a random non-targeted enemy (once per turn; in Focused Encounters, each Part count as 1 target)
- If there is just a single target, apply it to 3 targets instead
[OnSucceedAttack] Trigger [VibrationExplosion]; then, reduce target's [Vibration] Count by 1

text.name: Tidal Elegy
text.desc:
When attacking just a single target(in Focused Encounters, a Core and its connected Parts count as a single target), Coin Power +2 and deal +100% damage
[WhenUse] Clash Power +1 for every 4 [Sinking] on the main target (max 2)
[BeforeAttack] If the main target has higher than 1 Gloom Resist., deal +5% damage for every 0.1 excess Resist. (max 20%)
[BeforeAttack] At 2+ Gloom Reson., deal +10% damage for every Gloom Reson. (max 40%)

passiveList.name: Abyssal Dance
passiveList.desc:
- Combat Start: if there is just a single enemy, this unit's leftmost Attack Skill on the Dashboard gains Clash Power +1, and deals +11.5% damage on Hit after Clash Win (including E.G.O Skills)
- For the turns in which this unit Returned or Substituted in: Min & Max Speed +1, Clash Power +1

text.name: Tidal Elegy
text.desc:
[CantIdentify]
Targets randomly
[WhenUse] If main target has 5+ [Sinking], Clash Power +1
[BeforeAttack] Gain the following effects for every 3 highest Reson.
- Gain +1 Atk Weight (max 2)
- Deal +15% damage (max 30%)
[EndSkill] Apply 1 [HitDamageUp] next turn to (highest Reson.) random allies (including this unit; max 4 allies; once per turn)
coinDescs: [OnSucceedAttack] Trigger [VibrationExplosion]; then, reduce target's [Vibration] Count by 1

text.name: Tidal Elegy
text.desc:
[CantIdentify]
Targets randomly
[WhenUse] Clash Power +1 for every 5 [Sinking] on the main target (max 2)
[BeforeAttack] Gain the following effects for every 3 highest Reson.
- Gain +1 Atk Weight (max 2)
- Deal +15% damage (max 30%)
[EndSkill] Apply 1 [HitDamageUp] next turn to (highest Reson.) random allies (including this unit; max 4 allies; once per turn)
- If the said Reson. was a Gloom Reson. or an A-Reson., apply 1 [AzureDamageUp] as well
coinDescs: [OnSucceedAttack] If there are Staggered, Part broken, or killed units among the targets, inflict 1 [AzureTakeDamageUp] next turn against a random non-targeted enemy (once per turn; for Focused Encounters, each Part counts as 1 target)
[OnSucceedAttack] Trigger [VibrationExplosion]; then, reduce target's [Vibration] Count by 1

text.name: Tidal Elegy
text.desc:
[CantIdentify]
Targets randomly
[WhenUse] Clash Power +1 for every 5 [Sinking] on the main target (max 3)
[BeforeAttack] Gain the following effects for every 3 highest Reson. (if it was a Gloom Reson., for every 2 highest Reson.)
- Gain +1 Atk Weight (max 2)
- Deal +15% damage (max 30%)
[EndSkill] Apply 1 [HitDamageUp] next turn to (highest Reson.) random allies (including this unit; max 4 allies; once per turn)

coinDescs: [OnSucceedAttack] If there are Staggered, Part broken, or killed units among the targets, inflict 1 [AzureTakeDamageUp] next turn against a random non-targeted enemy (once per turn; for Focused Encounters, each Part counts as 1 target)
